job.title: Technical Product Manager, Data Science & Analytics, Apple Media Products - Cupertino
job.description: <br><strong>Summary<br></strong> <br>At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming phenomenal products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. If you are a self-motivated, high-energy individual who is not afraid of challenges, we’re looking for you. Apple is seeking a proven Technical Product Manager (TPM) to join the Apple Media Products Data Science team.<br><br><br>The TPM plays a critical role in collaborating with engineering and data scientists to design, maintain, build or improve mission-critical datasets from a multitude of sources. This role will involve working with internet-scale data across numerous product and customer touch points to drive initiatives that will make our data science organization more streamlined and productive.<br><br><br>The team’s culture is centered on rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way, plus tight-knit collaboration with data scientists, product, feature engineering and data engineering.<br><br> <br><strong>Key Qualifications<br></strong> <br>Proven experience in a Technical Product Management role, preferably for a digital-media or subscription business.<br><br>Proven experience in data-related programming languages (e.g. SQL, PySpark, Python, or R)<br><br>Knowledge of Client-Server metrics logging strategies as well as data architecture required for analysis<br><br>Hands on experience with the end-to-end data lifecycle across petabyte scale technologies<br><br>Prior experience in a technical role (preferably as a data analyst or engineer), delivering data insights to stakeholders <br><br>Strong experience designing and driving product strategy cross-functionally, collaborating with partners of various technical levels.<br><br> <br><strong>Description<br></strong> <br>Data is our product. We are looking for a self-starting, motivated individual with great communication skills that is passionate about managing and developing critical datasets to maximize Data Science capabilities. If you have a passion for Apple services (TV+, Music, Arcade, Podcasts, etc), it would be a big plus!<br><br><br>You should have a strong interest in driving large scale data products, engaging with key business stakeholders involved, and driving key communications throughout the business.<br><br> <br><strong>Education &amp; Experience<br></strong> <br>Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience in Engineering, Computer Science, or Business Information Systems<br><br> <br>Role Number: 200242971<br><br>
